name: Maddgoth's Homunculus
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
text: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 2d6 + 2 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead poisoned for 5 (1d10) minutes and unconscious while poisoned in this way.

description: Source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage p. 96
